name: Flickr Tweaks HD: No Ads, Wider Search Results
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
*** THIS STYLE WAS DESIGNED FOR COMPUTERS WITH A RESOLUTION OF AT LEAST 1920PX *** Just a simple style that remove all Flickr ads and takes advantage of our wide screens by putting the right column above search results and using the extra space to display more pictures per line! Enjoy!
